addOptionOpenPageInPopupWindow.message: Add option to open page in popup window

closeWhenFocusedInitialWindow.message: Close popup when normal window is focused

closeWhenFocusedInitialWindowHint.message: Popup window will not be closed if it was minimized or set as always on top

escKeyClosesPopup.message: Close popup window with an Escape key

escKeyClosesPopupHint.message: Alt + Enter will also open page in the main window

extensionDescription.message: Open any links and images in a popup window

fallbackPopupWindowLocation.message: Fallback option for popup window location

fallbackPopupWindowLocationHint.message: Used when the screen cursor position is not available

imageWithLinkPreferLink.message: When image is wrapped in link, prefer link

keepOpenPageInPopupWindowOpen.message: Don't close page popup window on focus lost

moveToMainWindowOnMaximize.message: Open popup in main window when maximized

openByDragAndDrop.message: Use drag and drop on empty place to open in popup

openByShiftClick.message: Use Shift + Click to open in popup

openDragAndDropUnderMouse.message: Always open by drag and drop under mouse cursor

openPageInMainWindowHotkeyDescription.message: Open popup window in the main window

openPageInPopupWindowHotkeyDescription.message: Open the currently opened page in a popup window

openSearchPopupWindowHotkeyDescription.message: Search the selected text in a popup window. Opens empty search page if no text is selected

popupSearchUrl.message: Search url (%s will be replaced with the search query)

rememberWindowResize.message: Remember popup size on manual resize

reopenAutoCreatedTabAsPopup.message: Reopen tabs opened by page as popup windows

reopenAutoCreatedTabsOnlyPinned.message: Reopen only tabs created by pinned tabs

reopenSingleTabWindowAsPopup.message: Reopen new single tab windows as popup windows

reopenSingleTabWindowAsPopupHint.message: With this option enabled, any new browser window with only one tab will be automatically reopened as a popup window. It allows extension to create popup for links which it usually can't access (for example, bookmarks bar). But it can lead to unwanted behavior if you usually open many browser windows, so use with caution!

searchInPopupEnabled.message: Option to search selection in popup enabled

showAddressbarIcon.message: Show button in address bar to open page in a popup window

tryFitWindowSizeToImage.message: Try to fit popup width to image aspect ratio

viewInPopupEnabled.message: Enable option to view images in popup window
